Package core

Interface HlaMoonUpdater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HlaHLAobjectRootUpdater, HlaReferenceFrameUpdater
    public interface HlaMoonUpdater
extends HlaReferenceFrameUpdater
    Updater used to update attribute values.

    This class is ThreadSafe as defined by Java Concurrency in Practice, see jcip.net.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Send all the attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        HlaMoonUpdater setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name for this update.
        Description from the FOM: A unique name for this reference frame instance. Reference frame names are essential in forming 'links' between parent/child reference frames.
        Description of the data type from the FOM:
        Specified by:
        setName in interface HlaReferenceFrameUpdater
        Parameters:
        name - the new name
        Returns:
        this updater

      • setParentName

        HlaMoonUpdater setParentName​(java.lang.String parentName)
        Set the parentName for this update.
        Description from the FOM: The name of this frame's parent reference frame. If this frame has no parent (i.e., is a 'root' reference frame), then this string must be empty, otherwise the non-empty string must correspond to the name attribute of some other ReferenceFrame object instance in the simulation.
        Description of the data type from the FOM:
        Specified by:
        setParentName in interface HlaReferenceFrameUpdater
        Parameters:
        parentName - the new parentName
        Returns:
        this updater

      • setState

        HlaMoonUpdater setState​(SpaceTimeCoordinateState state)
        Set the state for this update.
        Description from the FOM: A four dimensional representation of the reference frame with respect to its parent reference frame. If the parent fame is an empty string, then only the time dimension has meaning.
        Description of the data type from the FOM: A multi-dimensional representation of an observational coordinate frame and associated state. There are three spatial dimensions, three attitude dimensions and one time dimension. The spatial and attitude components define a right-handed orthogonal set of coordinate axes that constitute a reference frame. The time dimension specifies the 'position' of the coordinate with respect to the physical time scale (TT).
        Specified by:
        setState in interface HlaReferenceFrameUpdater
        Parameters:
        state - the new state
        Returns:
        this updater

      • sendUpdate

        void sendUpdate()
         throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                HlaAttributeNotOwnedException,
                HlaUpdaterReusedException,
                HlaInternalException,
                HlaRtiException,
                HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException,
                HlaSaveInProgressException,
                HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Send all the attributes. Note that the Updater can not be reused after sendUpdate has been called.
        Specified by:
        sendUpdate in interface HlaHLAobjectRootUpdater
        Specified by:
        sendUpdate in interface HlaReferenceFrameUpdater
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaAttributeNotOwnedException - if a changed attribute is not owned
        HlaUpdaterReusedException - if the Updater is reused
        HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException - if the object instance has been removed
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress
